channel.title: Need help with npc stuff
channel.description:
i know how to summon npcs but there is one problem i want them to say like robbertownz is offline how do i make them say that cause i want them to say my name lol.
and another thing i want to know is how u make npcs stand still when i let mine out they walk around, i dont want them to lol.
thos are only things please help. thanks
